content: Investments AMA The Fifth Person Asked by Tan Jie LunAsked on 20 Feb 2019How long have you all been in the market? Do you all invest in turnaround plays? Can you share your experiences with them? ?1 answerAnswerBump3

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 20 Feb 2019Hi, I have been investing in the market for 10 years already. Personally, I focus more on investing in good business so I have not invest in any turnaround play.0 comments1
